Welcome to my blog! My name is Stefan Stein and I'm a third year statistics PhD student at the University of Warwick. I blog about maths, stats and R. My PhD is on the asymptotics of random networks and high-dimensional statistics. Before coming to the UK for my PhD I obtained my BSc and MSc in mathematics at the University of Heidelberg, Germany. I like building unconventional stuff in R and Python and I set up this blog to share as well as keep track off some of the programming projects I did. Feel free to connect with me.
